title: Has anyone ever experienced a random big boost in skill after a break
body: its not like i suddenly went from b5 to faker, but as someoe who belived in elo hell last year i was amazed at how bad the players were when i recovered from y break and easily made it to silver in a week. i play every day, and have yet to lose lane as my prefered lane(mid) last year i was in b4 elo hell idk what happened. my decision making and mechanics got a lot better too. if your wondering how i climmbed bronze so easily and am now at silver 4, i simply played talon mid, onc ei won lane and killed bot/ my laner a few time i can click on the iddle of the team press r,w,hydra and get a triple almost by myslef. this never fails and ive used it to climb. some of u may see it as chap but i see u kat mains out there. the only problem is when im playing another champ or lane im always just as bad and someitmes worse than before. i do believe i can get to gold by the end of season, when i play ranked i usually carry.

replies.body:
I mean if I take a break from shitting, I notice a huge increase of shit in about a week.

i get that alot on pretty much every game i play. I cant beat a boss? I end up getting burnt out trying, come back a few weeks later and beat it on my 1st try. cant figure out a champion or am i just slumping on them right now? Play them like a month later and I maul my laner with them. Its pretty fun and cool when it happens :D

When you play for too long, you'll get tilted. Taking a break clears your mind. Just remember why you're playing this game in the first place. 
Good luck have fun.
